attributes.action: Remove and ban the television programme “Naked Education”
attributes.background:
Remove this programme.

It is disgusting, grown adults voluntarily getting naked in front of kids on television, potentially being viewed by millions of people is morally unacceptable.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about broadcast standards are a matter for Ofcom, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you want to complain about a television programme you can do so here: https://www.ofcom.org.uk/complaints/complain-about-tv-radio-a-website
